1370: Thieleman was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Sywi at age 35 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Sywi, Remsindis, at age 35.
1382: Lost his wife Sywi while she was giving birth to Hildeburgis in 1382.
1371: Had a daughter with Sywi, Ryccie, at age 36.
1374: Lost son Duker when Duker was 0 years old.
Sywi gave birth to their stillborn son Duker in 1374.
1376: Had a son with Sywi, Lambrecht, at age 41.
1378: Had a son with Sywi, Ludolphus, at age 43.
1379: Had a daughter with Sywi, Ghela, at age 44.
1381: Had a daughter with Sywi, Tetta, at age 46.
